title: Warp card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Warp card causes the player to [[blink]]: * Level 0: random blink * Level 1: semi-controlled (directional) blink * Level 2: controlled blink (random in [[Teleport_control#-cTele|-cTele]] levels) ==History== The Warp card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]]. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of escape|Escape]]
